nodes.text: A breadroot patty was an edible, white-colored patty made from breadroot. The Kragget restaurant located on Coruscant, the capital world of the Galactic Republic, served breadroot patties to its customers.

In 19 BBY, the Mandalorian soldier Mij Gilamar ordered a breadroot patty with his breakfast at the Kragget. Gilamar used the patty to soak up the egg yolk and roba meat remains that had been left on his plate after eating the rest of his breakfast, before finishing the patty as well.
The breadroot patty first appeared in the Republic Commando novel Order 66, written by author Karen Traviss and published September 16, 2008.
